alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Dooly; Houston; Macon; Peach; Schley; Sumter; Taylor; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 9:38AM EST until January 09 at 10:30AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Macon County in west central Georgia... Western Dooly County in central Georgia... Southeastern Webster County in west central Georgia... Peach County in central Georgia... Western Houston County in central Georgia... Central Crawford County in central Georgia... Schley County in west central Georgia... Sumter County in west central Georgia... Taylor County in west central Georgia... * Until 1030 AM EST. * At 938 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wesley Church to near Rupert to Leveretts, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Americus, Perry, Fort Valley, Butler, Ellaville, Oglethorpe, Roberta, Preston, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Unadilla, Montezuma, Marshallville, Reynolds, Plains, Byromville, Ideal, Leslie, and Andersonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for central and west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Dooly; Houston; Macon; Peach; Schley; Sumter; Taylor; Webster
